name: Nomad
description: Your people travel by herds, caravans, or stars. The road is your home and tradition your guide.

feature.name: Tribal Hospitality
feature.description: Among your kin or allied clans, you can expect food, shelter, and aid. Other nomadic peoples may recognize kinship and offer similar courtesy.

traits.text: I feel restless if I stay in one place.
I honor the old traditions above all.
I measure wealth in animals and stories.
I trust the stars more than maps.
I share everything with my companions.
I know songs and stories of my ancestors.
I am slow to anger but fierce when roused.

ideals.text: Community. The clan is stronger than any one member.
Tradition. The old ways preserve us.
Nature. We must live in harmony with the land.
Honor. My word is my bond.
Freedom. No walls can hold my spirit.
Change. We must adapt to survive.

bonds.text: I carry an heirloom that connects me to my ancestors.
I was separated from my people and seek them.
I must complete a journey my elder could not.
A rival clan wronged my family.
I protect the sacred places of my people.

flaws.text: I am distrustful of settled folk.
I take offense at perceived insults to my clan.
I am superstitious to a fault.
I struggle to understand city customs.
I hold grudges against those who wrong my people.
